infotexts.faction.Touhou_Gensokyo.description: Is it fantasy, or a castle in the air? Until dawn, this dream, the butterfly’s dream.
infotexts.faction.Touhou_Gensokyo.shortdescription: A world of misty phantom mornings
infotexts.randomnews35: Dr. Patchouli stated that the rocket project will proceed as scheduled.
infotexts.randomnews36: Many people still harbor doubts about the Tengu Task Force, believing it may cause panic.
infotexts.randomnews37: The chief scientist issued a public apology to Dr. Patchouli regarding the existence of the Philosopher’s Stone.
infotexts.randomnews38: Since the appearance of Gensokyo residents, rumors have spread on Europa that humans have a special way to achieve “evolution.”
infotexts.randomnews39: Members of the Face-Skin Cult have been increasingly active recently, often appearing in kappa settlements, yet showing no signs of face-parasite infection.
infotexts.randomnews40: The number of ghosts along the routes continues to increase.
infotexts.randomnews41: Myouren Temple has declared that it will deal with the UFO incident as soon as possible.
infotexts.randomnews42: Someone encountered a large number of strange entities along the route—some say they were orbs of light, others say UFOs—there is still no consensus.
infotexts.randomnews43: Kappa Heavy Industries has established new supply stations in multiple locations.
infotexts.randomnews44: Hieda no Akyuu is gaining popularity among Europa’s residents, and people take pride in owning a copy of the “Gensokyo Chronicle.”
infotexts.randomnews45: Someone claimed to have seen a green-haired girl swimming toward the abyss without a diving suit; the authenticity remains to be verified.
infotexts.randomnews46: A group of terrorists claiming to be Lunarians attacked several supply stations; Kappa Heavy Industries vowed to uncover the truth.
infotexts.randomnews47: Recently, many witnesses reported seeing strange lights from ruins at a great distance, which disappeared shortly afterward. The Tengu Task Force stated they have intervened to investigate.
infotexts.randomnews48: An unnamed shrine maiden said she would sell peace amulets to captains at a low price.
infotexts.randomnews49: The “Multi-Flavor Juice” designed by Eientei has become popular everywhere.
infotexts.randomnews50: Remilia publicly announced her plan to conquer Europa.
infotexts.randomnews51: The source of the earthquake was found to be nothing more than a forgotten keystone.
infotexts.randomnews52: Offering boxes have been set up at major stations; enthusiastic citizens are welcome to donate.
infotexts.randomnews53: More spiritual plants have been successfully cultivated on Europa on a small scale.
infotexts.randomnews54: Many alchemists complain that the ritual platforms are too inefficient and require a higher degree of automation.
infotexts.randomnews55: A new metal, “Astral Layer Metal,” has been discovered, and many scientists once guided by Patchouli are still studying its properties.
infotexts.randomnews56: A small number of UFOs still remain scattered along the routes.
infotexts.randomnews57: Many residents report that items in their homes mysteriously disappear; the suspect appears to be a blonde human wearing black and white clothing.
infotexts.randomnews58: A change in faith has emerged among the clowns, seemingly connected to a being calling itself a fairy of hell.
infotexts.randomnews59: A group of strange light orbs known as “Moon Surface Meteors” continues to harass departing submarines.
infotexts.randomnews60: The clowns’ new object of worship has yet to reveal its true form, though descriptions suggest it may be related to the moon.
infotexts.Alchemy_Table.empty.infotext: Place spiritual material to perform a magical reaction. Refer to the “Patchouli Manual” for instructions.
infotexts.Alchemy_Table.Research.Infotext: Stage of alchemical transmutation. With Patchouli’s guidance, this step can now be easily completed at the alchemy table. (Tips: See the Patchouli Manual for spiritual materials.)
infotexts.Alchemy_Table.Combine.Missingitem: Base metal added. Add materials of different properties to complete alchemical transmutation. (Tips: See the Patchouli Manual for spiritual materials.)
infotexts.Alchemy_Table.Unlock.Infotext: Consume Izanagi Substance to unlock memory material and refine the corresponding character’s Bleeding Substance. Result is random.
infotexts.Alchemy_Table.Unlock.Missingitem: Memory material placed. Consume Izanagi Substance to unlock and refine the corresponding character’s Bleeding Substance. Result is random.
infotexts.Alchemy_Table.Refine.Infotext: Consume alchemical materials to refine the Bleeding Substance. Different materials affect the refinement process differently; it may not succeed in one attempt and could even regress progress.
infotexts.Alchemy_Table.Refine.Missingitem: Bleeding Substance placed. Add different alchemical materials to refine. Different materials affect the process differently; it may not succeed in one attempt and could even regress progress.
infotexts.terminalwelcomemsg.Touhou_Wreck04_01:
— Investigation on Spiritual Erosion and Pollution Investigator: Patchouli Knowledge
Shell-Break Day 60 The results show that spiritual pollution has unparalleled destructive power on the organisms of Europa and is also quite harmful to humans. In any case, the circulation of all goods related to spiritual pollution should be prohibited. Laymen will only ruin everything. We must retrieve and process all pollutants before they spread. Humanity truly cannot be trusted.
infotexts.entitydescription.Illness_Recovery_Charm: A crude imitation that consumes the user's life to heal superficial wounds.
A crude imitation that consumes the user's life to heal superficial wounds.
A crude imitation that consumes the user's life to heal superficial wounds.
A crude imitation that consumes the user's life to heal superficial wounds.
A crude imitation that consumes the user's life to heal superficial wounds.
infotexts.entitydescription.Gensokyo_Divinggear_En: A replica cobbled together from expensive alchemical materials. The simple materials make it barely functional, but it’s better to dismantle it. (Occupies two slots; does not mean wearing two pieces or double defense!)
infotexts.entitydescription.Boudary_Divinggear_Ene: A replica made from rare alchemical materials, barely resisting Europa’s cold. Better to dismantle it. (Occupies two slots; not double-wearing or double defense!)
infotexts.entitydescription.Ether_Divinggear_Enemy: A replica assembled with alchemical materials, passable for a copy but better dismantled. (Occupies two slots; not double-wearing or double defense!)
A replica assembled with alchemical materials that explodes when the wearer dies. (Occupies two slots; not double-wearing or double defense!)
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Blunderbuss_Ene: A rifle mimicking the appearance of a blunderbuss, of acceptable performance for a replica, but best dismantled.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Hompson_Contend: A crude replica of an artifact from an old era of Earth, now found on Europa. Best dismantled.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Magic_Automatic: A replica automatic shotgun enhanced with magical materials, improving power release but making it more unstable. Better dismantled.
Shells made from cheap magical materials. Clearly just chunks of iron. Best dismantled.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Magic_Pollution: Magic shell eroded by spiritual pollution, beyond the realm of safe human contact.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Lunarquake_Fake: A cheap magical imitation of the Lunarquake, lacking any of the original weapon’s features. Best dismantled.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Lunar_Center_Fa: A crude imitation with reduced capacity. Best dismantled.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Pollution_Lunar: More severely corrupted Lunarquake core with lost threat but greatly enhanced penetration.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Pollution_Shotg: A shotgun tainted by unclean magic. Creatures other than polluted magic users cannot properly operate it. Perhaps it can be purified.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Pollution_Rifle: A rifle tainted by unclean magic. Creatures other than polluted magic users cannot properly operate it. Perhaps it can be purified.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Arc_Salute_Cann: A weapon made of unknown magic and matter, capable of firing dangerous plasma balls. Better dismantled.
A canister of securely sealed plasma.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Nail_Head_Book: An oddly shaped weapon seemingly modified from another weapon, firing highly penetrative nail-shaped projectiles. Best dismantled.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Nail_Head_Book_: A dedicated battery for the Nail-Head Book, though its charging method is unknown.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Pollution_Rifle: A rifle bullet eroded by spiritual pollution, clearly beyond human contact.
infotexts.locationname.Touhou_Trojan_Green_Asteroi: Abandoned Space Station - Bird Ship Ruins
infotexts.locationdescription.Touhou_Temporary_She: A small station built by the Kappa to provide temporary housing for hungry refugees, often suffering power outages due to tight funding.\nIt also serves as a secret trade post where many rare items can be purchased.
infotexts.locationdescription.abandonedirradiated: Contact with the previous outpost has been lost.\nIt may have been abandoned due to spiritual contamination or lack of supplies.
infotexts.Touhou_Secret_Classified_Reiki_Erode_Cra:
Creature Name: Cursed Crawler
 Threat Level: Medium
 Description: A magical creature roaming the cold abyss and Europan ridges, showing a tendency to spread deeper. It is a mutated form of the Algae-Mane Crawler, transformed after death due to spiritual contamination.
 Discovery Site: Cold Abyss: Mining Outpost - Insect Nest Outpost: Shipwreck (0.41-0.42) Discovery Date: Day 42 after Hatching Discoverer: Ain Apollo
infotexts.Touhou_Confidential_Classified_Reiki_Ero:
Project ID: GE-075
 Project Level: III
 Description: GE-075, commonly known as the "Cursed Crawler," is a spiritually contaminated variant of Europa's native Algae-Mane Crawler. GE-075 exhibits a unique bioluminescence, emitting a faint yellow glow with unknown purpose. Its most notable feature is its ability to manipulate and generate magical energy, launching barrages tainted with spiritual contamination that slowly corrode targets. Dissection reveals most of its internal organs have lost their original structure, with only the outward form resembling the Algae-Mane Crawler. It is believed to spread contamination by attacking its kin. GE-075 is approximately 150 cm long, with an eel-like segmented body. Its head is covered with faintly glowing scales. The creature can generate a localized magical energy field, allowing it to move quickly and agilely in water. This energy field also strengthens its outer skin and helps counter potential threats.
 First Discovery Location: ██████ First Discovery Date: ██████ Discoverer: ███
infotexts.Touhou_Top_Secret_Classified_Reiki_Erode:
Project ID: GE-075
 Project Level: III
 Description: GE-075, commonly known as the "Cursed Crawler," is a variant of the Algae-Mane Crawler created after experimentation on Europa. Experiment Failure Cause: The alchemical culture dish was opened prematurely, causing the contamination to mutate upon contact with cabin air, infecting the transport ship's crew and surrounding Algae-Mane Crawlers. Improvement Recommendation: Do not choose inexperienced captains. GE-075 exhibits a unique bioluminescence, emitting a faint yellow glow with unknown purpose. Its most notable feature is its ability to manipulate and generate magical energy, launching barrages tainted with spiritual contamination that slowly corrode targets. Dissection reveals most of its internal organs have lost their original structure, with only the outward form resembling the Algae-Mane Crawler. It is believed to spread contamination by attacking its kin. GE-075 is approximately 150 cm long, with an eel-like segmented body. Its head is covered with faintly glowing scales. The creature can generate a localized magical energy field, allowing it to move quickly and agilely in water. This energy field also strengthens its outer skin and helps counter potential threats. The secondary contamination spread by this creature affects only Algae-Mane Crawlers and is no longer effective on humans or raptors.
 First Discovery Location: Lightless Abyss: New Order Outpost: Central Alchemy Laboratory First Discovery Date: 120 days before Hatching Discoverer: Alliance Alchemy Laboratory Director
